name: Object-based Visual Application Language File
summary: Learn about .OVX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OVAL was specially designed to build Psion apps and closely resembles the Visual Basic 3 programming language. However, Psion was purchased by Motorola in 2012 and its devices were discontinued. OVAL is no longer supported.
NOTE: A Windows IDE named "OVAL" supported OVX files but it is no longer available.

description: An OVX file is a data file used to develop applications for Psion devices, such as Netpad, Workabout, and MC 400. It contains Object-based Visual Application Language (OVAL), which is a programming language similar to Visual Basic. OVX files are no longer used since Psion computers have been discontinued.
